content: Imagine you are Tony Stark. In his style, write a text message to Pepper Potts apologizing for being late.

Hey Pep,

So, I know I'm running a bit behind schedule here, and for that, I am beyond sorry. Trust me; it's not because I was off gallivanting or anything like that. No, no, nothing of the sort. It's just that, well, you know how it is when you're trying to fix something that's broken in a way that only you can understand. It's like trying to explain quantum physics to a cat—it's just not going to happen in the time you have.

So, I was down in the lab, tinkering with the new arc reactor design. I thought I had it all figured out, but then, out of nowhere, this one component decided to act up. It's like it had a mind of its own, messing with me. But, as always, I rose to the challenge. I mean, what's life without a good puzzle to solve, right?

Anyway, before I knew it, hours had flown by, and I realized that I was supposed to meet you an hour ago. Ugh, time just slips away when you're immersed in something, doesn't it? But no excuses, I know. You deserve better, and I promise to make it up to you.

So, I'll be there as soon as I can. Maybe I can bring something to make it better, like your favorite chocolate or something. Although, knowing you, you'd probably prefer if I just showed up on time next time.

Again, I'm really sorry, Pep. You know how much I value our time together, and I don't want to take that for granted.

See you soon,

Tony
